titles.title: Thunder Bay National Marine Sanctuary and Underwater Preserve Boundary Modification Act
Thunder Bay National Marine Sanctuary and Underwater Preserve Boundary Modification Act
A bill to expand the boundaries of the Thunder Bay National Marine Sanctuary and Underwater Preserve, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

calendar.text: Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation. Ordered to be reported with an amendment favorably.

committee.name: Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation

action.text: Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation. Reported by Senator Rockefeller with amendments. With written report No. 111-65.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 148.

bill.summary: 8/4/2009--Reported to Senate amended. Thunder Bay National Marine Sanctuary and Underwater Preserve Boundary Modification Act - Expands, notwithstanding any provision of law or regulation, the boundaries of the Thunder Bay National Marine Sanctuary and Underwater Preserve in Lake Huron.
